title: (1) of the Schedule, is set out in column (2) of the Schedule opposite the mention
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of 

Drivers) (Fees) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited road traffic (licensing drivers) (fees) regulation 2020

title: (1) of the Schedule, is set out in column (2) of the Schedule opposite the mention
heading: 2. The fee to be paid to the licensing authority, with effect from 12 March
text_raw:
2. The fee to be paid to the licensing authority, with effect from 12 March 
2020, on the application to it in respect of any of the matters referred to in column 
(1) of the Schedule, is set out in column (2) of the Schedule opposite the mention 
of that matter. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th March, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [75] 3

title: (1) of the Schedule, is set out in column (2) of the Schedule opposite the mention
heading: Licence
text_raw:
SCHEDULE

Replacement licence exchanged abroad
